title: Microwave Phase Stable Cable 70% VP
content: High-quality coaxial cable engineered for stable and efficient signal transmission in microwave applications.

title: Microwave Phase Stable Cable 77% VP
content: High-quality coaxial cable engineered for stable and efficient signal transmission in microwave applications.

title: Mini Coax cable with 70% VP Single Shiled (Briad and Spiral Shield)
content: Compact, space-saving coaxial cable optimized for tight installations.

title: Ethernet CAT6a Cable
content: Advanced Ethernet cable with support for up to 10Gbps speeds, designed for robust network connections, ideal for high-performance network environments.

title: Twinax Cable
content: High-speed, low-latency cable suited for short-distance data transmission, used in data centers and network applications requiring rapid, secure signal integrity.

title: HDMI Cable
content: Standard HDMI cable supporting high-definition video and audio transfer, enabling seamless multimedia streaming and optimal viewing quality for devices and displays.

title: USB Cable
content: Versatile USB cable for fast data transfer and power delivery, compatible with a wide range of devices, from computers to peripherals, for efficient connectivity.

title: IEEE1394b Cable
content: High-speed data transmission cable designed for multimedia applications, offering enhanced bandwidth for seamless device communication.

title: Custom Made Cable
content: Fully tailored cable solutions built to precise specifications, offering specialized functionality, material choice, and performance characteristics to meet unique industry and application requirements.
